segments.text: I'm just looking at this kitchen, and it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely zoned out, it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate while water floods the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The amount of water running out is truly impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the damage this will cause to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water too, just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This beautiful kitchen is being ruined by her lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are having their own adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That little boy is so close to toppling over, it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her forbidden treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a curious blend of domestic routine and utter disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR
